oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Interview and performance - Eric Andersen - 2015-11-08
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Interview with and performance by Eric Andersen in the Ford Theater of the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on November 8, 2015. In support of the exhibition Dylan, Cash, and the Nashville Cats: A New Music City.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eric Andersen;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Interview conducted by Pete Finney. Includes selected audio excerpts and audio from video. Performance includes; I Shall Go Unbounded -- Dusty Boxcar Wall -- Foghorn -- Violets Of Dawn -- Salt On Your Skin -- Wind And Sand -- Close The Door Lightly -- Blue River -- Unidentified song [likely You've Got To Love Her With A Feeling] -- Is It Really Love At All
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Andersen, Eric; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
